p: ARDS is seen fairly often in the context of these diseases, and has been reported in up to 30% of SARS patients (Huang et al. 2005), 40% of MERS patients (Saad et al. 2014) and approximately 30% of hospitalized COVID-19 patients (Huang et al. 2020). Interestingly, a full 93% (50/54, P < 0.0001) of patients who developed ARDS in a Chinese cohort were non-survivors (Zhou et al. 2020).
